summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 22.200.020, 22.204.040, 22.204.050, 22.204.060, 22.204.090, 22.204.100, 22.204.190, 22.204.230, 22.206.020, 22.206.040, 22.206.050, 22.206.080, 22.206.090, 22.206.110, 22.206.130, 22.206.140, 22.206.160, 22.206.200, 22.206.220, 22.206.230, 22.206.250, 22.206.260, 22.206.270, 22.206.280 and 22.206.290 and adding a new section 22.206.215 to clarify and improve the application, coverage and enforcement of the substantive requirements of the Housing and Building Maintenance Code.
